National_City.Palomar Street station: Palomar Street is a station of the Blue Line on the San Diego Trolley. It is located in Chula Vista, California. The stop serves a variety of purposes, holding the function of commuter center with a park and ride lot and providing access to the nearby commercial, industrial, and residential areas, as well as Southwestern Community College (reachable via the 712/712L bus line), etc.
